attributes.action: Keep the national stadium of Northern Ireland football in Belfast
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Keep the national stadium of Northern Ireland football in Belfast.  Do not build a national stadium in the middle of no where keep it in Belfast, where the majority of sports fans live.  Build a new stadium in Belfast where the entire infrastructure already exists, where there are restaurants and bars as well as other amenities for fans.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
